projects.title: Songle Sync Tutorial
projects.description: An interactive tutorial for the Songle Sync <abbr title="Application Programming Interface">API</abbr> that allows controlling numerous devices in synchrony with the songs.

ja.description: 多種多様なデバイスを音楽と同期して制御できるSongle Sync <abbr title="Application Programming Interface">API</abbr>のためのインタラクティブなチュートリアルです。

projects.title: f3.js
projects.description: A parametric design tool for physical computing devices for both interaction designers and end-users.

ja.description: <abbr title="Internet of Things">IoT</abbr>機器の筐体設計とファームウェア開発を同時に行える設計ツールです。専門知識不要で機器をカスタマイズできます。

projects.title: TextAlive
projects.description: An integrated design environment for kinetic typography; desktop app revamped as a web service in 2015.

ja.description: 音楽に同期して歌詞がアニメーションする動画を制作でき、演出をJavaScriptで拡張できる統合制作環境です。

projects.title: CrossSong
projects.description: A logic puzzle for "musical thinking," deepening your understanding on music while enjoying the puzzle.

projects.title: Sharedo
projects.description: A to-do list interface for sharing tasks between human and agents including robots and software personal assistants.
